name: Real-Time Email Validation
description:
Verify email validation during processing

**Resultado Esperado:**
Valid emails pass (john@example.com), invalid emails flagged (invalid.email, @nodomain.com, missing@.com)

**Datos de Prueba:**
CSV with mix of valid and invalid emails
